workflow.name: Preview1 Use Case for  Tercel Service Designer and End User
workflow.title: Preview1 Use Case for  Tercel Service Designer and End User

properties.name: Place Order - End User Use Case-Pass/Fail

properties.description:
Preview1   Use Case for  Tercel Service Designer and End User
1. Fetch the WF
2. Create a Action 
3. Create a Form
4. Get Schema by FormID
5. Publish/Validate the Form 
6. Update a Action with a Form 
7. Create a Service_Group
8. Create a Service 
9. Create a Category 
10. Get Images 
11. Create a CatalogItem
12. Create a CatalogItemAction
13. Publish CatalogItem
14. Place a Order 
15. Get the Order Details 
16. Delete the CatalogItemAction, CatalogItem , Category , Service , Form and Action
